sqlMap.select: SELECT Z.ORGCODE, Z.ORGNAME,Z.BJZBZ, DECODE(S.SYRKNUM, NULL, 0, S.SYRKNUM) AS SYRKNUM, DECODE(B.BZDZNUM, NULL, 0, B.BZDZNUM) AS BZDZNUM, DECODE(D.SYDWNUM, NULL, 0, D.SYDWNUM) AS SYDWNUM, DECODE(F.SYFWNUM, NULL, 0, F.SYFWNUM) AS SYFWNUM FROM (SELECT T.ORGCODE, T.ORGNAME,T.BJZBZ, T.ORGLEVEL FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.ORGCODE LIKE '%21020441%' ORDER BY T.ORGCODE desc) Z LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(S.ID) AS SYRKNUM, S.GXZRQDM FROM SYRK_SYRKXXZB S WHERE S.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND S.GXPCSDM = '210204410000' GROUP BY S.GXZRQDM) S ON S.GXZRQDM = Z.ORGCODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(B.MLDZID) AS BZDZNUM, B.ZRQDM FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB B WHERE B.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND B.PCSDM = '210204410000' GROUP BY B.ZRQDM) B ON B.ZRQDM = Z.ORGCODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(D.ID) AS SYDWNUM, D.GLBMID FROM DW_DWJBXXB D WHERE D.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND D.GLPCSID = '210204410000' GROUP BY D.GLBMID) D ON D.GLBMID = Z.ORGCODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(F.ID) AS SYFWNUM, F.SS4JBMDM FROM SYFW_FWJBXXB F WHERE F.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND F.SS3JBMDM = '210204410000' GROUP BY F.SS4JBMDM) F ON F.SS4JBMDM = Z.ORGCODE
SELECT T.FWDZ_ZBX, T.FWDZ_ZBY, T.FWDZ_DZXZ FROM SYFW_FWJBXXB T WHERE t.XT_ZXBZ = '0' and t.SFCZFW = '1' and t.fwdz_zbx is not null and t.fwdz_zby is not null and t.SS4JBMDM = #orgCode#

SELECT t.id,t.fwdz_zbx , t.fwdz_zby , t.fwdz_dzxz FROM SYFW_FWJBXXB t WHERE t.XT_ZXBZ = '0' and t.SFCZFW = '1' and t.fwdz_zbx is not null and t.fwdz_zby is not null and t.SS4JBMDM = #orgCode# and t.id in (SELECT t.czfwid FROM SYFW_CZFWJCXXB t WHERE t.XT_ZXBZ='0' and t.JCDW_GAJGJGDM = #orgCode#)

SELECT t.id,t.fwdz_zbx, t.fwdz_zby, t.fwdz_dzxz FROM SYFW_FWJBXXB t WHERE t.XT_ZXBZ = '0' and t.SFCZFW = '1' and t.fwdz_zbx is not null and t.fwdz_zby is not null and t.SS4JBMDM = #orgCode# and t.id not in(SELECT t.CZFWID FROM SYFW_CZFWJCXXB t WHERE t.XT_ZXBZ='0' and t.JCDW_GAJGJGDM = #orgCode#)

select t.jzd_zbx zbx,jzd_zby zby,t.xm title from SYRK_SYRKXXZB t where t.xt_zxbz ='0' and t.id in(select t.SYRKID from ZDRY_ZDRYZB t where t.xt_zxbz ='0' and t.glbm= #orgCode# and t.zdrygllxdm=#zdrydm#)

select t.jzd_zbx zbx,jzd_zby zby,t.xm title from SYRK_SYRKXXZB t where t.xt_zxbz ='0' and t.id in(select t.SYRKID from ZDRY_ZDRYZB t where t.xt_zxbz ='0' and t.glbm like '%'||#orgszCode#||'%' and t.zdrygllxdm=#zdrydm#)
SELECT * FROM SYRK_SYRKXXZB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.SYRKYWLXDM = #syrkywlxdm# AND (T.GXZRQDM = #gxzrqdm# OR T.GXPCSDM = #gxpcsdm#)

SELECT T.LX, T.LXMC, SUM(T.SL) SL FROM TJ_SYRK T WHERE 1=1
T.SQDM = #orgCode#
T.ZRQDM = #orgCode#
GROUP BY LX, T.LXMC UNION ALL SELECT T.LX, T.LXMC, SUM(T.SL) SL FROM TJ_GZDX T WHERE 1=1
T.PCSDM = #orgCode#
T.ZRQDM = #orgCode#
GROUP BY LX, T.LXMC UNION ALL SELECT T.LX, T.LXMC, SUM(T.SL) SL FROM TJ_BZDZ T WHERE 1=1
T.PCSDM = #orgCode#
T.ZRQDM = #orgCode#
GROUP BY LX, T.LXMC UNION ALL SELECT T.LX, T.LXMC, SUM(T.SL) SL FROM TJ_DWXX T WHERE 1=1
T.PCSDM = #orgCode#
T.ZRQDM = #orgCode#
GROUP BY LX, T.LXMC UNION ALL SELECT T.LX, T.LXMC, SUM(T.SL) SL FROM TJ_SYFW T WHERE 1=1
T.PCSDM = #orgCode#
T.ZRQDM = #orgCode#
GROUP BY LX, T.LXMC UNION ALL SELECT T.LX, T.LXMC, SUM(T.SL) SL FROM TJ_JQXX T WHERE 1=1
T.PCSDM = #orgCode#
T.ZRQDM = #orgCode#
GROUP BY LX, T.LXMC UNION ALL SELECT T.LX, T.LXMC, SUM(T.SL) SL FROM TJ_AJXX T WHERE 1=1
T.PCSDM = #orgCode#
T.ZRQDM = #orgCode#
GROUP BY LX, T.LXMC UNION ALL SELECT T.LX, T.LXMC, SUM(T.SL) SL FROM TJ_WHSTJ T WHERE T.PCSDM = #orgCode# GROUP BY LX, T.LXMC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SYFW_FWJBXXB t WHERE t.XT_ZXBZ ='0' AND t.Sfczfw ='1' AND (T.SS4JBMDM = #orgCode# OR T.SS3JBMDM =#orgCode#)
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SYFW_FWJBXXB t WHERE t.XT_ZXBZ ='0' AND (T.SS4JBMDM = #orgCode# OR T.SS3JBMDM =#orgCode#)

select count(1) from SYFW_CZFWJCXXB t where t.XT_ZXBZ ='0' and t.CZFWID in(SELECT t.id FROM SYFW_FWJBXXB t WHERE t.XT_ZXBZ ='0' AND t.Sfczfw ='1' AND (T.SS4JBMDM = #orgCode# OR T.SS3JBMDM =#orgCode#))
select count(1) zdrycount,t.zdrygllxdm zdrybm from ZDRY_ZDRYZB t where t.xt_zxbz ='0' and t.ryid is not null and t.glbm= #orgCode# group by t.zdrygllxdm
select count(1) zdrycount,t.zdrygllxdm zdrybm from ZDRY_ZDRYZB t where t.xt_zxbz ='0' and t.ryid is not null and t.glbm like '%'||#orgszCode#||'%' group by t.zdrygllxdm
select count(1) zdrycount,substr(d.dwlbdm,0,2) zdrybm from dw_dwjbxxb d where d.xt_zxbz='0' and (d.glbmid= #orgCode# OR d.glpcsid=#orgCode#) group by substr(d.dwlbdm,0,2)
SELECT t.JZD_ZBX zbx,t.JZD_ZBY zby, t.XM title FROM SYRK_SYRKXXZB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.SYRKYWLXDM = #syrkywlxdm# AND (T.GXZRQDM = #gxzrqdm# OR T.GXPCSDM = #gxpcsdm#)
